pkgmetadata.longdescription: devpi: PyPI server and packaging/testing/release tool===================================================================``devpi`` is a meta package installing two other packages:- `devpi-server <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/devpi-server>`_: for serving a pypi.python.org consistent caching index as well as local github-style overlay indexes.- `devpi-web <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/devpi-web>`_: plugin for devpi-server that provides a web and search interface- `devpi-client <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/devpi-client>`_: command line tool with sub commands for creating users, using indexes, uploading to and installing from indexes, as well as a "test" command for invoking tox.For getting started see http://doc.devpi.net/Holger Krekel, September 2014
